articles.title: Pakistan great Wasim Akram wants ODIs to be scrapped - DAWN.com
articles.description: Says the 50-over game has no future in front of the ever-growing T20 format.
articles.content:
LONDON: Pakistan pace bowling legend Wasim Akram feels ODI cricket has become run-of-the-mill stuff now and wants the administrators of the game to scrap the format for good.
